text.title: Scottish Labour elect Kezia Dugdale new leader
text.head: Scottish Labour elect Kezia Dugdale new leader
Sources

list.item: "Kezia Dugdale elected Scottish Labour leader" — BBC News Online , August 15, 2015
Stephen Bush. "Kezia Dugdale elected leader of Scottish Labour" — New Statesman , August 15, 2015
Tom Peterkin. "Kezia Dugdale backtracks on Jeremy Corbyn criticism" — The Scotsman , August 12, 2015
Libby Brooks. "Kezia Dugdale: Corbyn win could leave Labour 'carping on sidelines'" — The Guardian , August 2, 2015
